resources.string: Number Prediction is a simple game of numbers where the Player guesses the secret number generated by the Computer or Device. There will be 3 levels (Easy,Normal,Hard).
1. In Easy level, when the Player guesses a number the Player will be indicated if the guessed number is higher or lower to the secret number. In this level, the secret number would be of two digits.

2. In Normal level, when the Player guesses a number the Player will be indicated if the guessed number is higher or lower to the secret number. In this level, the secret number would be of three digits.

3. In Hard level, when the Player guesses a number the Player will be indicated if the guessed number is higher or lower to the secret number. In this level, the secret number would be of four digits.
